entry.title: RT Sam aka ScaryBarbie ðŸ‘½: i started dabbling in crypto in 2021 when i lost my job as a server. -started trading -decided i needed to do something w...
entry.summary: RTâ€‚Sam aka ScaryBarbie ðŸ‘½ i started dabbling in crypto in 2021 when i lost my job as a server. -started trading -decided i needed to do something with my time during quarantine & dove into learning how to code -built a following of 30k on instagram by sharing my learning exp journey daily -maintained and grew a community ultimately learning more than just code -how to market myself -work w/ brands/collaborations -design, create content, edit videos -UX/UI design -writing/comms -how to learn quickly & effectively all these skills were self-taught through learning and failing (repeat x100) i then made the leap over to twitter & got involved in web3 communities that accelerated my journey by providing opportunities for me to travel & attend hackathons/workshops (big thanks to @womenbuildweb3 @developer_dao & @camiinthisthang) i wouldn't be where i am if it weren't for being brave enough to take risks even in painful scary times & searching for communities that paved paths for me i didn't even know where possible. i'm forever grateful to be in this industry surrounded by brilliant people creating & building everyday ðŸ«¡
